# [G7C1-XXX](https://bath-group7.atlassian.net/browse/G7C1-XXX)

N.B. The title of PR must also reference a [JIRA ticket number] in square brackets.

Optionally, you may even name the PR the same as the JIRA ticket, for example:

**[G7C1-32] Set up a PR template.**

## Description

Description of the change and why it was made.

## Definiton of Done

This PR:

- [x] Delivers the functionality of the ticket it closes.
- [x] Is tested locally and includes unit tests using the [JUnit 5](https://junit.org/junit5/) (where applicable).
- [x] Follows [Java style guide](https://google.github.io/styleguide/javaguide.html).
- [x] Code is commented using the [Javadoc tool](https://www.oracle.com/technical-resources/articles/java/javadoc-tool.html) and any other applicable documentation e.g. on Confluence is updated.
- [x] Is rebased/cleaned up to be easy to review.
